title: My transaction failed, Can I confirm my tickets? : BookMyShow Support Centre
category: Pay Later - LazyPay : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
Good news! In case your transaction has failed you shall be re-directed to retry screen which would give you an option to book your tickets using Lazy pay.
If you're eligible, you can pay via OTP verification on BMS portal. Just in case you don't want to use the lazy pay option you can also pay with a different mode of payment.
You'll be able to pay using Lazy pay only if you clear the credit checks required by Lazy pay.
NOTE: If your luck is too bad and your transaction fails post using Lazy pay you'll be redirected to the home page. This option is only applicable for a movie transaction.
